name: Uruk doesn't wanna die
description:
It is my first game and did not have that much time, but either way I did it with pygame and it is just a crappy game, but I have truly learned a lot, so I am fine with it.

You can kill the "monsters (humans)" by jumping on them which gets you money. With it you can upgrade some stats, with which you can get money easier and a higher score.
